sequence:
New Year's Blessings

<size=45>Chapter 4 The Sakura Empire's New Year</size>

scripts.say: I've long heard the Sakura Empire's new year celebrations are lively... but are they really that fun?
I'm curious about that "sobaean muchy" thing Yuudachi mentioned! Man, I'm starving after throwing so many snowballs.
You wanna try Akashi's handmade mochi, huh? Let me tell you, it's like a bombshell from Flavortown!
Now that you mention it, last year Laffey taught me a lot of interesting things about Japanese New Year's.
Right. Like about gods, shrine visits, that kind of stuff?
I mainly heard about it through Iron Blood channels. I believe they said "the more people, the better it is."
Umm... there's also the way Eugen drinks... Oh, I guess it's pretty hard to imagine how that looks...
From them, huh? I believe it's called "the more, the merrier." If you're that curious about it you may as well come to the Sakura Empire dormitory and see for yourselves.
Exactly. If you're so curious then we could invite everyone to try and show how generous the Sakura Empire is. Any objections, Akagi?
It sounds kinda weird to celebrate a holiday with some people you just fought...
Don't be like that. Sure we're from different factions, but we're all comrades just trying to keep this base peaceful! No need to be so headstrong, Montpelier! Hahahah!
Since the snow on your clothes is starting to melt, perhaps we should head for the dormitory soon?
You're right. We'll get sick if we wear wet clothes in this weather. Let's go right away.
All right! All units: full steam ahead! Our target is Akashi's zouni!
Whew~ My zouni is finally done nya! Who wants to be the first to...
